text.page:
225
101-113a @#/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya ra brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing / mchog tu rmad du byung ba rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho ma hA ma Ni ru tsi ra ka lA pa bi tsi tra/ mug+ta dA ma/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ pa ra satwa mo tsa ka /ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma ko Sha d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma/ lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya/ su ra ta/ sam+b+ho ga u pa de sha ka/ kle sha ga ra pra sha ma ka/ shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba/ a nu swa ri/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa pa ra/ ba ra ta/ ba ra Na da da/ o~M ma hA phA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma sa man+ta b+ha dra/ sa man+ta saM d+ha ra/ sa man+ta A ka ra/ sa man+ta pra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ he he many+dzu ra ba/ ma hA badzra ma hA khaD+ga/

226
101-113b tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ bi ra dza bi ra dza/ karma a ba ga ma ka/ ku ru ku ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ ma hA ma hA/ ma hA ma hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ho b+ho/ b+hI ma b+hI ma/ na da na da/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ mo tsa ya/ ma ma nA tha ma nu sr-i ta/ a ba ya duHkha na/ su khaM da/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ a nA tho haM/ duHkhi to haM/ sa ra dzo haM/ u pa dru to haM/ a bi bik+to haM/ ku si d+ho haM/ mA ra Na d+harmo haM/ twaM b+ha ga bA na/ duH khi tA nAM/ su khaM da da/ a nA thAM nAM/ sa nA tha ka ra/ sa ra dza sAM/ bi ra dza ska ra/ u pa dru tA nAM/ swa ra u pa dra ba pra sha ma ka/ a bi bi ga tA nA/ ku sha la saM b+ha ra/ pa ri pU ra yi tA/ ku sid+hA nAM/ ma hA bIr+ya d+ha tA/ mA ra Na d+harmi Na/ ma mi ta pa dA dA tA/ ma ma bi b+ha ga bA na/ nA tho b+ha ba/ sha ra NaM/ pa rA ya NaM/ tra tA/ sarba duHkhA ni me pra sha ma ya/ sarba kle sha ra dzAM si mi/ a ba na ya/ sarba saM sA ra u pa dra ba/ duHkhA ni mi/ nA sha ya/ sarba ku sha la d+harma pa ri pU ra me ku ru/ sarba karma A ba ra Na/ kle sha pa ra ba ta me bi ka ri/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa si bi d+hi/ bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo gaM me saM ni yo dza ya/ a ra Na d+harma/ bi rA ga bi ra dza/ sany+dza ha/ pra dza ha/ d+ha ri Ni/ sa ma kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+hi sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/ rig sngags don kun sgrub pa 'di/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ /de ma thag tu sems can rnams/ /skye dang rga ba zad par 'gyur/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/ /log 'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur/ /sdig pa zhi bar byed pa yi/ /gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang / /grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed/ /'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar/ /'jam

227
101-114a dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrags shing / /gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na/ /brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu pa'i/ /sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis/ /sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /srin po mi bzang gzugs can rnams/ /stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smras/ /lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ /thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/ /gang na rdo rje ral gri che/ /de yi drung lhags smras pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la/ /shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can/ /bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/ /sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang / /sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag /shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/ /drag po drag po rab 'joms pa/ /gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal/ / dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe/ /rdo rje can te snying sbyong ba/ /mi shes pa yi rab rib sel/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba/ /skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes/ /gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad/ /mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can/ /spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/ /dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs de rab tu bzhad/ /dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /ha ha'i sgra ni grags par bsgrags/ /rab tu dang bas bstan pa dga'/ /rgya chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can/ /tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste/ /sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /cha lugs

228
101-114b sngo la sa skyong ba/ /lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad/ /'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel bstan/ /rgyal po'i 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa/ /brtan po rnams la brtan par grags/ /yon tan dag gis phyogs su bzhad/ /btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa/ /rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags/ /stobs po che la shugs che ba/ /phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po/ /sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste/ /'dzem shes rab srung ngo tsha shes/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i mchog /dkyil 'khor chen po ston pa po/ /dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan/ /ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba/ /mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam/ /hU~M gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po/ /lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyid/ /zham ring gad rgyangs chen po can/ /rlung drag mun pa sel mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags/ /gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba/ /drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can/ /'dzum zhing sgeg par kun du ston/ /spyod pas ltar brtan pa lags/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa/ /nyi ma gsal ba lam me pa/ /nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs bzhin/ /tha ler zhugs shing rgya cher bzhad/ /mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad/ /nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin/ /gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa/ /dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri/ /kun du rmongs pa sel bar mdzad/ /'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa/ /zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa/ /dpung rgyan snyan che gdub kor can/ /nor bu'i rgyan

229
101-115a gyis brgyan pa ste/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron/ /rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po/ /ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa/ /dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog /'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste/ /'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa/ /dkar ba sngo ba 'od bzang ba/ /mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags/ /ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston/ /shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad/ /stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa/ /byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen/ /rnam par grags pa gsan pa des/ /rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los sgyur/ /'jigs med blo gros shes rab can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin pa/ /mgur bzang 'dul mdzad zhi ba ste/ /zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa/ /lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/ /sems can kun la rab ston pa/ /brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog /sems can rnams kyi blo la mkhas/ /sred med bu ste drag shul stobs/ /me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste/ /byis pa sku mchog mchog sbyin pa/ /rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/ /phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin rdul med brtan/ /mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa/ /bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/ /mi mchog brtson pa bskyod du med/ /de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/ /brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /mya ngan med cing gnas pa med/ /'joms med tshig bzang chu lugs bzang / /dpa' bo dgra rnams rab 'joms pa/ /tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa gnod pa khyab par gshegs/ /mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog /gshin rje pham mdzad skye dgu srung / /las dang nyon mongs rab

230
101-115b sreg pa/ /ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags/ /legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing / /dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di/ /lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/ /bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang / / gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang / /mdangs 'phrog gtum po rgod rnams kyis/ /de ring legs par bstod par gyur/ /'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gis rab/ /bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur/ /de dag kun la bltas nas kyang / /'di skad du ni tshig smras pa/ /khyed kun rtag tu bgegs med cing / /nges legs thar pa thob gyur la/ /'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog /nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig /de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing / /'brug chen sgra ni sgrogs pa yi/ / de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/ /shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul/ /sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs/ /shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur/ /kye ma bsod nams cher byas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni rab sbyang phyir/ /dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/ /'jam pa'i klog gis rab tu bshad/ /la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi/ / grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am/ /yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung / /de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/ /de yis nges par thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang / /ring bor mi thogs de yis 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ /rab dga' shin tu dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs

231
101-116a pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /sa chen dam pa de dag kyang / /gang zhig nges gnas 'dod pa yi/ /sems can chen pos mi thogs par/ /tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang / /sems can kun la sdug pa dang / /spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/ /byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang / /sdig pa thams cad zhi byed pa/ /bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di/ / sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /nang par langs nas su brjod pa/ /de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang / /de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag /rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang / /de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams/ /de la nges par srung bar byed/ /de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing / / mnyam par gzhag par snang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag /dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis/ /rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas/ / 'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so/ /lan cig bklags na tshangs chen dang / /bsod nams mnyam pa thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/ /nyin re mtshan mchog brjod byas na/ /dri ma med cing rab dag la/ /rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang / /sems can thams cad dga' ba yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob/ /mtshungs pa med cing stobs bskyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang / /'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing / /yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs

232
101-116b te 'dun pa yi/ /gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //
